title: 105_s1826
content: 1999 Women's World Cup amendment to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. The curr_chunk is about articles not intended for sale or distribution to the public, specifically personal effects of aliens. Participants in the 1999 Women's World Cup, officials, accredited members of delegations, and persons with special status. Participants in the 1999 Women's World Cup, officials, accredited members of delegations, and persons with special status, along with immediate family members, servants, equipment, and materials imported in. The curr_chunk is about the connection of persons involved in the 1999 Women's World Cup event with articles. The curr_chunk discusses the use of articles in exhibitions showcasing the culture of a country participating in an event. The curr_chunk mentions that the Secretary of the Treasury may allow other articles in addition to the ones mentioned previously. The amendment exempts certain articles from taxes and fees, effective 15 days after enactment.
